Attached is the Addendum to the Original Licensing Study Report for the above

MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
DIVISION OF CHILD WELFARE LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CP390201215
Licensee Name: Michigan Department of Health and Human
Services
Licensee Address: 235 South Grand Avenue
Lansing, MI 48902
Licensee Telephone #: (517) 373-3768
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Barbara LaRue, Administrator
Jooyeun Chang, Designee
Name of Facility: Kalamazoo County DHHS
Facility Address: 427 E Alcott Street
Kalamazoo MI 49001
Facility Telephone #: (269) 337-5000
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, FIA
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
Kalamazoo County Department of Health and Human Services relocated from 322
Stockbridge Kalamazoo, MI 49001 to 427 E Alcott Street Kalamazoo MI 49001.
III. Methodology
The on-site inspection of the new space was completed on September 2, 2020.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The new office is two story building located at 427 E Alcott Street Kalamazoo MI
49001. The first floor consisted of a main lobby. Both the first and second floor
were observed to have multiple rooms designated for visitation and conference
rooms, a large file storage area, ample cubicle workspaces, break room and
bathrooms. The office had locked storage available for confidential information and
a crosscut shredder for disposal of confidential information, including CHRI. The
space is suitable for the purposes of the agency.
V. Recommendation
I recommend the new location be licensed for a child placing agency.
September 3, 2020
________________________________________
Jessica VandenHeuvel Date
Licensing Consultant
September 3, 2020
________________________________________
Claudia Triestram Date
Area Manager
2
